name: Festival Town Bubble Shoot
description: Welcome to the lovely Festival Town Bubble Shoot. You arrived just on time for the annual festivities, the popular bubble fair is here to take you to an exciting adventure. Visit the fair, try out all the fun rides and booths and earn awesome boosters and bonuses that will help you advance to the next amazing level. There are over 1000 exciting levels to explore, filled with colored bubbles, puzzles and challenges. So you should get going right away.
